attributes.action: Vote Off Prime minister of the UK Rishi Sunak
attributes.additional_details:
Rishi Sunak starts by clearly stating," I stand with isreal"
Days Later he announces, "We must support the Palestinian people" 
Followed by a statement of 10 million to be sent to palestine. 
On Thursday 19th he started his 2 day visit to Isreal to show his support and demonstrating the British backing for the Israeli Government. 
YOU CAN'T HAVE IT BOTH WAYS! 
I feel he clearly isn't a strong leader Changing his words and view point on things every now and then.
attributes.background: I urge the government to start a genral election soon as I feel the current Prime Minister; Rishi Sunak is unwanted by many and is slowly loosing supporters due to current speeches.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions which call for actions with regard to named individuals, including the Prime Minister, but you may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action:

Call an immediate general election: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
